DIGIPRAM

The management software designed and created for Administrative Practice Agencies that is now also web-based

Home > Services > DIGIPRAM

DIGIPRAM is the management software designed and created for Administrative Practice Agencies that is now also web-based. It was created by Acentro Services and is not intended for resale, but is a product available to the market.

DIGIPRAM is designed and developed for an administrative practice agency, a hybrid professional who needs to manage many variables, both predictable ones for bureaucratic administrative practice and the unpredictable, offering an effective procedure to solve problems.

A Complete Management Software for Your Agency

DIGIPRAM offers a management system that addresses the web and is intended for an administrative practice agency or a hybrid professional who needs to manage many variables and needs an effective procedure.

The goal is to simplify use and ensure precision, catching every detail at a glance.

Main Features

Flexible Installation

Can be installed on-premises or used entirely via web, with an end-client side for operational interaction.

Operational Dashboard

Unique for registrations, advancements and practice control, deadlines and interactive communications, archive and guided workflow when needed.

Price List and Item Management

Analytical or synthetic expense management, automation of every accounting aspect and small administrative and financial management integrated with the practice.

Interactive Archive

For practices and every document, with preparation of a document area manageable by the operator, up to compliant storage with Acentro Services service.

Integrated Practices

Possibility of simultaneous actions on multiple practices/records.

Multi-level Price Lists

Percentage discounts or customized rates, coupons, promotions, printing of personalized proposals and quotes.

Phone Contact Management

Customer census and typological profiling for a performing CRM.

Inventory Management

For distribution of tools like digital signature, smart cards, USB, etc.

Multiple Schedules

With automated text sending, integrated email and connection to practice file.

Processing Time Measurement

Specific profiles for each operator.

Diversified Statistics

To create business intelligence with predefined tools and reports or through Excel extraction and sending personalized PDFs.

Electronic Invoicing Integration

DIGIPRAM is ready for integration with accounting systems thanks to electronic invoicing, allowing the adoption of standards and, if necessary, automated forwarding to SDI through Acentro Services service.

DIGIPRAM Benefits

Operational Efficiency

Centralized management of all administrative practices with optimized workflows.

Time Saving

Automation of repetitive activities and immediate monitoring of practice status.

Complete Control

Total visibility on all agency activities, from practices to invoicing.

Flexibility

Adaptable to the specific needs of each administrative practice agency.

Who It's For

DIGIPRAM is intended for:

  • Administrative practice agencies
  • Professionals managing bureaucratic practices
  • Professional firms needing to manage documentation and deadlines
  • Operators needing an integrated system for practice and invoicing management

The software is particularly suitable for those who need to manage many variables, both predictable ones for bureaucratic administrative practice and the unpredictable, offering an effective procedure to solve problems.

What Our Clients Say
